body:
## Release Notes

- Update github actions. @iphydf (#265)
- Remove settings.yml in favour of hs-github-tools. @iphydf (#262)
- Use GPL license with https. @iphydf (#261)
- Add CODEOWNERS and settings.yml files. @iphydf (#150)
- [ImgBot] Optimize images @imgbot (#149)
- Renamed haskell repos. @iphydf (#147)
- Fix spec doc generation on the website. @iphydf (#146)
- Add support for "draft" PR status. @iphydf (#145)
- Add Nim bindings and hqtoxbot to integrations @ehmry (#144)
- add ToxCon 2019 [2] @zoff99 (#143)
- Point travis links to travis-ci.com. @iphydf (#142)
- Update integrations.md @antis81 (#139)
- Keep Rust integrations up-to-date @kpp (#140)
- add jTox @almindor (#138)
- Change "design documents" to "documents". @zoff99 (#136)
- Remove redundant link @nurupo (#134)
- Add netlify configuration for website deployment previews. @iphydf (#135)
- Add explanation of what the icons in the PR table mean @robinlinden (#133)
- Format yaml files according to yamllint's requirements. @iphydf (#132)
- Design proposal: system call mocking in c-toxcore. @iphydf (#83)
- Add icons for behind and blocked PR states @robinlinden (#130)
- Enable .travis.yml check and use non-markdown license. @iphydf (#129)
- Remove semdoc from the website. @iphydf (#127)
- Fix links to renamed repos. @iphydf (#126)
- Remove libtox link, which has become dead. @iphydf (#125)
- Add venom to Desktop clients section @naxuroqa (#124)
- add minitox to integrations @hqwrong (#122)
- Update integrations.md @137x3w (#121)
- Update links to Rust implementation @kpp (#119)
- add PyTox ToxPhone @zoff99 (#120)
- Update binding urls for vala and go @naxuroqa (#118)
- add toxer to desktop integrations @antis81 (#117)
- Add a bazel test that ensures all our projects are GPL-3.0. @iphydf (#115)
- Remove cedar from the website repo. @iphydf (#114)
- Add favicon. @iphydf (#106)
- Improve font for the file list. @iphydf (#105)
- Some minor editor improvements. @iphydf (#104)
- Initial version of the Cedar web-based IDE. @iphydf (#103)
- Add toxic and toxins repos to the website. @iphydf (#102)
- Rename "Tox specification" menu item to "Protocol". @iphydf (#92)
- Fix spec's book icon. @iphydf (#91)
- Rename main.css to style.css, like on tox.chat. @iphydf (#90)
- Adopt the tox.chat design so we look more integrated. @iphydf (#89)
- Remove twemoji @robinlinden (#86)
- Relicense under GPLv3. @iphydf (#87)
- add rustybot @zoff99 (#85)
- Add go-toxcore-c repo to the website. @iphydf (#82)
- add ToxPhone @zoff99 (#84)
- add more projects @zoff99 (#81)
- Add integrations page to menu. @iphydf (#80)
- Add missing repos to the website. @iphydf (#78)
- Remove jvm-linters from the website. @iphydf (#77)
- Add all builds to the website. @iphydf (#76)
- fixed jekyll install instructions @cebe (#73)
- Add Jenkins build badges. @iphydf (#75)
- Add polyfill to make PR table work in old browsers. @robinlinden (#71)
- Fix for old pandoc: rename .lhs to .tex before processing. @iphydf (#74)
- Escape html in pr branch and title. @robinlinden (#72)
- Change colour of reload button while reload in progress. @robinlinden (#70)
- Add age info to PR table. @robinlinden (#69)
- Make PR-table text the same size as all other text. @robinlinden (#67)
- Reduce font size and fix underline in PR table. @robinlinden (#66)
- Use system fonts instead of serving webfonts. @robinlinden (#65)
- Add design doc metadata to all designs. @iphydf (#64)
- Create Tox_Quick_Name_Lookup_Specification.md @GrayHatter (#15)
- Fix comment about where to click on the pulls page. @iphydf (#61)
- Fix internal spec link. @iphydf (#60)
- Set a site-wide default layout. @robinlinden (#49)
- Ignore toktok.ltd in linkchecker. @iphydf (#59)
- Fix link to plan.html (now designs/plan.html). @iphydf (#58)
- Switch the pulls file over to using markdown. @robinlinden (#48)
- Convert css to scss. @robinlinden (#46)
- Remove links to rust-lang.org. @robinlinden (#41)
- Change url from toktok.github.io to toktok.ltd. @robinlinden (#44)
- Move `design/*` to `designs/*`. @iphydf (#54)
- Make the PR number point at github, and the branch at reviewable. @iphydf (#55)
- Reorder navigation entries: put changelog and roadmap together. @iphydf (#53)
- Move repo list onto a separate page. @iphydf (#51)
- Move original project plan to designs. @iphydf (#52)
- Add missing step 5 picture to community reviews howto. @iphydf (#56)
- Add note about lack of security audit. @iphydf (#50)
- Fix makefile dependencies on changelog and roadmap. @iphydf (#40)
- Add a howto for community reviews using Reviewable. @iphydf (#36)
- Modify LICENSE.md to actually be in markdown. @robinlinden (#38)
- Silence linkchecker's robots.txt warnings. @robinlinden (#30)
- Lots of changes to the PR table. @robinlinden (#32)
- Exclude template files from site generation @cebe (#43)
- Moved travis commands into make file for local development @cebe (#34)
- Add line break before "loading pull requests". @iphydf (#35)
- Remove black eyed peas video from getting started page. @iphydf (#39)
- Add CNAME file for github pages to know about toktok.ltd. @iphydf (#37)
- Add a paragraph saying which links to find where. @iphydf (#33)
- Add `Get started` page with some initial content @zetok (#31)
- Make reviewers column more readable in pr-table. @robinlinden (#19)
- PR-table-related CSS improvements. @robinlinden (#18)
- Add linkchecker and markdown linter. @iphydf (#16)
- Copy resources from hs-toxcore repo on page build. @iphydf (#17)
- Fix outdated links. @robinlinden (#13)
- Fix header after table of contents in Tox spec. @robinlinden (#10)
- Add ToC to Tox spec. @robinlinden (#9)
- Fix page descriptions. @robinlinden (#6)
- Remove comments no longer needed. @robinlinden (#8)
- Make links relative. @robinlinden (#7)
- Add GITHUB_TOKEN to travis build. @iphydf (#4)
- Added .travis.yml, Makefile and renamed src/ to toktok/ @robinlinden (#3)
- Add github and reviewable links to the PR table. @iphydf (#2)
- Convert yst website to use Jekyll. @robinlinden (#1)

## Features

- Fix tables design. Close #116 @SkyzohKey (#123)
- Add integrations page. @iphydf (#79)
- Add reload button to pulls page. @robinlinden (#68)
- improved overall responsiveness of design @cebe (#20)
- Make all headings subheadings of the title of the page. @robinlinden (#26)
- Refactor out pr-table js into its own file. @robinlinden (#27)

## Bug Fixes

- Fix link to home and add canonical urls. @robinlinden (#25)
- use twemoij.js to enable emoij in all browsers @cebe (#22)

## Documentation

- Move #toktok to LiberaChat @c0dev0id (#255)
- add actual rust bindings to integrations page. @zoff99 (#155)
- Added more Android clients @Monsterovich (#153)
- Change Antidote repo link @Tha14 (#248)

## Maintenance (Grunt tasks)

- add infos and talks from the rC3 events @zoff99 (#258)
- Downgrade to ubuntu 20.04 LTS. @iphydf (#256)
- Only git pull if .git exists. @iphydf (#253)
- Don't build docs for ruby extensions. @iphydf (#251)
- Delete travis; add GitHub workflow. @iphydf (#250)

## Maintenance (Code cleanup)

- Remove references to Jenkins @nurupo (#245)
name: v0.1.0
